meanings: (답·계산·사실 등이) (잘못되다) be wrong, be incorrect, be mistaken, (잘못하다) make a mistake (in), commit[make] an error (in)
if my memory does not fail me

vlive.korean: 저게 왜 틀리지? Why is that wrong? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.18 노래방탈출 #2 (Escape Singing Room #2)
[아무도 틀리지 않고 60번대 진입!] [In the 60s without anyone getting it wrong!] View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.93
vlive.english: [In the 60s without anyone getting it wrong!]

vlive.korean: 죄송한데 코러스 하지 말고 기타 틀리지 마세요! Please don't sing as the chorus and focus on the guitar! 듣기 View video 심포유 - my SMTelevision : [심포유 #첸] EP17 #대나무숲을달리다 #취향저격 #태세전환갑
vlive.english: Please don't sing as the chorus and focus on the guitar!

vlive.korean: [상상도 못한 결과] - 1번이 왜 틀리지? - 1번 왜 틀렸어? [Unexpected result] - Why did we get the 1st one wrong? - Why? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.18 노래방탈출 #2 (Escape Singing Room #2)
vlive.english: [Unexpected result] - Why did we get the 1st one wrong? - Why?

vlive.korean: [4개의 모션을 틀리지 않고 수행하면 승!] 부릉 부릉 부릉! [Speed bump/ brakes. Team that does not make any mistakes wins] Vroom! Vroom! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [FULL] <찾았다 스트레이 키즈> 1화
vlive.english: [Speed bump/ brakes. Team that does not make any mistakes wins] Vroom! Vroom!

examples.korean: The success of the raid depended on split-second timing. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 습격의 성공은 몇 분의 1초도 틀리지 않은 타이밍에 달려 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The success of the raid depended on split-second timing. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Your guess wasn’t far out at all. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 네 추측이 크게 틀리지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Your guess wasn’t far out at all. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We can safely say that he will accept the job. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 그 일을 수락할 것이라고 말해도 별로 틀리지 않을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We can safely say that he will accept the job. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: be exact to a cent 듣기 Add to Wordbook 계산이 1센트도 틀리지 않다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: My guess wasn't wrong. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내 추측은 틀리지 않았다 Neungyule
